OOC: Oops. I forgot he was doing something.  If Yan doesn't mind, he can 
control him. Or assign someone to control him.

::Chaostaur::
       "Yes, yes.  I gathered that you would need bullets.  Why do you think 
that this is so hard to reconfigure?  It isn't something that's fun to do.  I 
have to totally rearrange the innards.  Now then, tell me what you need me to 
do while I am working on this."

--part1_122.2649193.28958cd2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
